DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study assess safety effectiveness Sirolimus elute Cypher Select ( TM ) stent reduce angiographic in-stent late loss de novo native coronary lesion compare TAXUS ( TM ) Paclitaxel-eluting stent patient present two coronary artery stenosis ( prospective , randomize , intra-individual comparison ) .
DOC.brief_title: Intra-Individual Comparison Sirolimus Paclitaxel Coated Stent ( FRE-RACE Study )
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , 2 arm , randomize , multicenter Phase III study ( 6 center ) . A total 110 patient least two de novo native coronary artery lesion ( lesion A , lesion B ) ≤ 30 mm length ≥ 2.25 mm < 3.0 mm diameter visual estimate enrol . Patients randomized implantation sirolimus elute Cypher Select ( TM ) Balloon-Expandable Stent TAXUS ( TM ) Paclitaxel-eluting stent lesion A B .

angina pectoris define Canadian Cardiovascular Society Classification ( CCS I , II , III , IV ) OR unstable angina pectoris ( Braunwald Classification B & C , IIIIII ) document ischemia OR patient document silent ischemia Two de novo lesion < 30 mm length ( visual estimate ) Target vessel lesion site ≥ 2.25 mm ≤ 3.0 mm diameter ( visual estimate ) Target lesion locate native coronary artery cover one stent ( single lesion ) Acceptable candidate coronary artery bypass surgery ( CABG ) Target lesion stenosis > 50 % < 100 % ( thrombolysis myocardial infarction [ TIMI ] 1 ) ( visual estimate
